name: Burn The Witch!
description:
Inquire the characters of this captivating story and found out the witch's hidden secret!

Submission for the Vim Jam 3.

Controls:

- Play with the mouse.

- Play in full screen for the best experience.

Known bugs:

- At the end of the game you can keeping increase your score pressing a button. Your actual score is the first that appears on the screen.

- Some typos.

Credit:

- desing, development and asset made by plasol
